messages.message: In Converse (Prod), adding 3 documents to the scope blocks the ability to change model type without resizing the window (bad outcome). Adding many documents adds a '+X more' bubble which reveals the model selection button again (good outcome). Loom here (https://www.loom.com/share/89473697d3744dd99d4b07de37dd980a?sid=d6636e82-ffa4-428d-bcd5-3145abf8892f)
Thanks @Hamish for reporting, the fix for this is in progress as part of: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1593
